response.overview: Pet Shop Boys new album, Nonetheless, is now available in the audiophile blu-ray format complete with immersive Dolby Atmos Mix and a 96/24 hi-res stereo version.  The album sees Neil Tennant and Chris Lowe work with producer James Ford for the first time. Ford has previously worked with artists including Arctic Monkeys, Depeche Mode, Blur, Gorillaz and Simian Mobile Disco.  Nonetheless features 10 brand new tracks, recorded and mixed in London last year, primarily at James Fordâ€™s studio in East London. The orchestra and backing vocals were recorded at The Church studio in North London.  As well as the Dolby Atmos Mix and the hi-res stereo mix, this special blu-ray release features the video to the first single 'Loneliness' which was directed by Alasdair McLellan.
response.title: Nonetheless
